description:
The VMware needs to cache morefs as much as possible throughout the codebase.
This will avoid extra VC queries.
title: VMware driver should cache morefs

comments.content:
The VMware needs to cache morefs as much as possible throughout the codebase.
This will avoid extra VC queries.
